name: The Deepest Cave (Lefolemi)
description:
Hi!

This is a Game I created for Mix and Game Jam 2020 with theme "Mixing Genres"

This game is a mix of Pac-Man, Top Down Shooter, and Dungeon Crawler

Feedback is appreciated!

/  Credits  \

Music was made with Otomata Music

http://earslap.com/page/otomata.html

Sound Effects was made with Sfxia and Bfxr

https://rxi.itch.io/sfxia

https://www.bfxr.net/

/  Controls  \

WASD : Move

Left Click : Shoot

Space : Dash

/  How to Play  \

- Collect the "F" thing to fill the fuel bar, You will get a Game Over if the fuel bar drop to 0.
- Find the keys to unlock the gate.
- Dash will drain your fuel quickly.

- Also, you can increase the fuel bar a little by shooting enemies.

/  Story  \

Your character is trying to retrieve a stolen important item at the deepest part of the cave. I ran out of ideas in this one :/
